description:
Nami has a horrifying run in with Bartholomew Kuma, Perona becomes the latest lady to vanish, and Chopper, Franky, and Usopp team up to strike a blow against Oars!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ashioto Naki Shuurai!! Nazo no Boumonsha: Boukun Kuma
The Silent Assault!! The Mysterious Visitor, `Tyrant` Kuma!
Une invasion silencieuse. Le mystérieux visiteur : Kuma le tyran
Беззвучное вторжение!! Загадочный посетитель: Тиран Кума
الهجوم الصّامت!! الزّائر الغامض، كوما الطّاغية
足音なき襲来!! 謎の訪問者 暴君くま
